text: Hi all! Quick update on *child themes.* Based on the feedback we have received we have increased the limit of the amount of child themes you can create in CMS Pro and CMS Enterprise. CMS Hub Pro now supports the creation of 5 child themes. CMS Hub Enterprise now supports the creation of 10 child themes.

Thanks for the feedback here everyone! We just <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CSFGKSHT7/p1621433255005500|announced limit increases> for child themes. Let me know if you have any questions or feedback.
Awesome <@ULCSUPTGU>!  I had just had a customer ask about this!
<@ULCSUPTGU> actually... How does this apply to the CMS standalone?   For example, this is my current plan.  Does the Marketing Pro receive the same as CMS Pro in terms of child themes?

CMS Standalone is the equivalent of CMS Hub Pro so it will support 5 child themes. Marketing Hub also has the same limits of CMS Hub. 5 child themes in Marketing Hub Pro and 10 child themes for Marketing Enterprise.
